translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when the stars fall away,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when the seas burst forth,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when the graves spill out,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹then˺ each soul will know what it has sent forth or left behind.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ

translations.text: O humanity! What has emboldened you against your Lord, the Most Generous,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya ayyuha al-insanu magharraka birabbika alkareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Who created you, fashioned you, and perfected your design,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

translations.text: moulding you in whatever form He willed?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But no! In fact, you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: while you are certainly observed by vigilant,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, the virtuous will be in bliss,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the wicked will be in Hell,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: burning in it on Judgment Day,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and they will have no escape from it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: What will make you realize what Judgment Day is?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.text: Again, what will make you realize what Judgment Day is?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ

translations.text: ˹It is˺ the Day no soul will be of ˹any˺ benefit to another whatsoever, for all authority on that Day belongs to Allah ˹entirely˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma la tamliku nafsun linafsinshay-an wal-amru yawma-ithin lillah
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
